headline: Sports is the only thing keeping linear TV 'alive' right now
summary: LightShed Partners partner and media & technology analyst Rich Greenfield checks in on the state of media and streaming stocks, citing cord-cutting away from linear TV and regulatory pressures on broadcast channels. Also hear Rick Greenfield's comments on why Disney (DIS) could be better off spinning off ABC over broadcaster backlash to Jimmy Kimmel. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
